meanings.definition: A set of connected things or parts forming a complex whole.
meanings.sent1: The solar system includes the sun, planets, and moons.
meanings.sent2: The circulatory system in our bodies helps transport blood.
meanings.sent3: I tried to organize my toys into a system, but they kept getting mixed up.
meanings.sent4: Her family was like a well-oiled system, each member playing a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The nervous system is like a communication network within our bodies.

meanings.definition: A set of principles or procedures according to which something is done; an organized scheme or method.
meanings.sent1: Following a proper study system can help you learn more effectively.
meanings.sent2: The legal system ensures justice is served in society.
meanings.sent3: I have a system for making the perfect sandwich every time.
meanings.sent4: Her system for time management was so efficient, she never missed a deadline.
meanings.sent5: Learning a new language requires a systematic approach to practice and study.
